snippet: SELK--Phyllis, on January 1, 2016. Beloved wife of Leonard, devoted mother of Ronnie and Michael, adored grandmother of Andrew, Douglas and Mark, cherished great- grandmother of Hayley. Service Monday, January 4, 11:00am at Riverdale Temple, 4545 Independence Ave., Riverdale. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SELK--Phyllis, on January 1, 2016. Beloved wife of Leonard, devoted mother of Ronnie and Michael, adored grandmother of Andrew, Douglas and Mark, cherished great- grandmother of Hayley. Service Monday, January 4, 11:00am at Riverdale Temple, 4545 Independence Ave., Riverdale. 1/3
